title: Old Jedi proverbs of great wisdom and knowledgeness.
body:
If live long enough you do, much ignorance you will find, impart wisdom I shall.

________

**"If only one of you there is, lose teamfight you will."**

-

**"When squishy team you have, pick jungle graves you should not."**

-

**"If use your ult for farming you do, too short a cooldown it has."** _(cough Ezreal, cough Lux)_

-

**"Fear leads to anger, anger leads to salt. Salt, is the path to loss."**

-

**"Check phone you do, and lose fight you shall."**

-

**"When vs Zed you do, let go of all you fear to lose, for lose it you shall."**

-

**"Last pick assassin you will, only when 2 or more tanks you have."**

-

**"Instalock you do, in bronze you shall stay."**

-

**"Every move of pros, mindlessly you copy? learn you will not."**

-

**"If push lane do you, demand gank you should not."**

-

**"When 0/7/0 you are, build tri-force you don't."**

-

**"If surrender in ranked you do, forever padawan you will be."**

-

**"Check map you should, safer will you be."**

-

**"If In bronze assassin meta, insist on playing Azir, Aurelion Sol and Taliyah you do, punch yourself in the face you should, save you pain it will."**


________

Pass on, what you have learned...

replies.body:
Yasuo ban you must, or feed he will

I had a good chuckle and read all of these in a yoda voice in my head.
I did too, and why isnt that yoda quote in there.
Because I have no experience with him feeding, because I haven't given him the opportunity to NOT be banned in all of my games :P

Aye, you already follow yoda's wisdom on that then

Don't even give him a chance to feed.
i liked this post. Keep up the memes Seshomaru.
y are u even allowed to post
"Distinguished member" my friend, he can get away with a lot of stuff now...
